resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104227</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104227</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205795</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">American Roots Arts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikaner Verwurzelt Künste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Américain Enracine des Arts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Americano Enraiza Artes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Americano Sradica Le Arti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανικές τέχνες ριζών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Americano Arraiga Artes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is the website for the PBS series by the same name. It includes summaries of episodes, oral histories, information about songs and artists, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist die Web site für die PBS Serie durch den 
gleichen Namen. Sie schließt Zusammenfassungen von Episoden, 
von Mundgeschichten, von Informationen über Liede und Künstler und 
von mehr ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est le site Web pour la série de PBS par le même
nom. Il inclut des sommaires des épisodes, des histoires 
orales, des informations sur des chansons et des artistes, et de plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é o Web site para a série de PBS pelo mesmo 
nome. Inclui sumários dos episodes, de histories orais, de 
informação sobre canções e artistas, e de mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è il Web site per la serie di PBS dallo stesso 
nome. Include i sommari degli episodi, dei dati storici orali, 
delle informazioni sulle canzoni e sugli artisti e di più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ο ιστοχώρος για τη σειρά PBS από το ίδιο 
όνομα. Περιλαμβάνει τις περιλήψεις των επεισοδίων, των 
προφορικών ιστοριών, των πληροφοριών για τα τραγούδια και τους 
καλλιτέχνες, και περισσότεροι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">está el Web site para la serie de PBS por el 
mismo nombre. Incluye los resúmenes de episodios, de historias 
orales, de la información sobre canciones y artistas, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205795</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104227</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/american-roots-arts</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
